vote.title: Authorize (1) acquisition of approximately 12,313,671 square feet (282.68 acres) of land located at 8600 Clark Road from the Trust for Public Land for development of a future park; and (2) an increase in appropriations in an amount not to exceed $600,000.00 in the Reforestation Fund - Not to exceed $2,550,000.00 ($2,500,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $50,000.00) - Financing: Reforestation Fund (see Fiscal Information)
vote.description: Authorize (1) acquisition of approximately 12,313,671 square feet (282.68 acres) of land located at 8600 Clark Road from the Trust for Public Land for development of a future park; and (2) an increase in appropriations in an amount not to exceed $600,000.00 in the Reforestation Fund - Not to exceed $2,550,000.00 ($2,500,000.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $50,000.00) - Financing: Reforestation Fund (see Fiscal Information)
